Invocation Name: chuck swindoll sermons
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Two passions have directed the life and ministry of Chuck Swindoll: an unwavering commitment to excellence in the practical communication and application of God’s Word and an untiring devotion to seeing lives transformed by God’s grace. Chuck has devoted more than five decades to these goals, and he models the contagious joy that springs from enthusiastically following Jesus Christ.

Insight for Living is the Bible-teaching ministry of Chuck Swindoll and airs around the world. Our desire is for people to grow in their understanding of God’s plan for their lives and also to mature as authentic Christians in a needy, hostile, and desperate world. Learn more about this ministry at insight.org.
